gov.usgs.anss.edgeoutput

Class RingFileInputer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.edgeoutput.DataSource
      • gov.usgs.anss.edgeoutput.RingFileInputer

  • public class RingFileInputer
extends DataSource
    Read data ring data file. This uses a RawDisk to a data file to read in the next data. The user must be tracking the last used block as this class does not persistently store it.

                       int startBlock)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException
        Creates a new instance of RingFileInputer
        Parameters:
        fname - The file name to open
        startBlock - if -1, as far back in ring as allowed, if >0, the starting block number
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if fname does not exist
        java.io.IOException

                   throws java.io.IOException
        set the next sequence to get
        Parameters:
        n - The next sequence to set
        Returns:

      • getNextData

        public int getNextData(byte[] buf,
                       boolean noBlock)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Read the next block from this ring file.
        Parameters:
        buf - Buffer to put the data block
        noBlock - If true, then do not block on read but return -1 instead
        Returns:
        Number of bytes read, or -1 if noBlock is set and no data is available.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
